mapper.select: select * from member where email=#{email} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.insert: insert into member(user_id, user_name, user_email, user_pwd, user_phone) values(#{user_id},#{user_name},#{user_email},#{user_pwd},#{user_phone})
mapper.update: update member set nickname = #{nickname} where email=#{email} and pwd=#{pwd}
